snippet: The 20th Fire Island Dance Festival is bringing in dancers from top companies, including American Ballet Theater’s Marcelo Gomes, who has also choreographed a new work for the weekend.
abstract: Fire Island Dance Festival, celebrating 20 years in existence, will feature three performances with a roster of more than 50 dancers.
lead_paragraph: The 20th Fire Island Dance Festival is bringing in dancers from top companies, including American Ballet Theater’s Marcelo Gomes, who has also choreographed a new work for the weekend.

headline.seo: Fire Island Dance Festival Features a Work by Marcelo Gomes
headline.main: Glorious Views, Fancy Steps and Painful Memories
headline.print_headline: Glorious Views, Fancy Steps and Painful Memories
